snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden says La Guardia Airport in New York could use some major improvements.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden says La Guardia Airport in New York could use major improvements, likening it to an airport in a third world country; Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, which operates La Guardia, responds to stinging comment, saying it is investing $3.6 billion for new central terminal building.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden says La Guardia Airport in New York could use some major improvements.

headline.main: Biden Compares La Guardia Airport to ‘Third World’
headline.print_headline: Biden Compares La Guardia Airport to ‘Third World’

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
